definition: ring road/circle line (e.g. rail or subway)
ring/hoop/loop/(chain) link/classifier for scores in archery etc/to surround/to encircle/to hem in
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: The station is called Beijing Station and it is on the blue circle line.
sentences.chinese: 那一站是北京站，在蓝色环线地铁线路上。

sentences.english: The London railway has an inner circle and an outside circle.
sentences.chinese: 伦敦的铁路有内环线，还有外环线。

sentences.english: The London railway has an inner circle and an outside circle.
sentences.chinese: 伦敦的铁路有内环线，还有外环线。

sentences.english: Situated right next to the Inner Ring, SNIEC offers you an easy access to the city centre.
sentences.chinese: 毗邻内环线，使您来往中心城区更为便捷。

sentences.english: Yes, we'll take the Loop line and then change to Line 1 at the Jianguo Men station.
sentences.chinese: 要换乘，我们乘环线然后在建国门站换乘一号线。

sentences.english: Shanghai China Link, viaducts built first.
sentences.chinese: 上海中环线首段高架道路建成。

sentences.english: I need to check if we need to change from the Loop line to the Line1?
sentences.chinese: 我要核实一下我们是否需要从环线换乘到一号线。

sentences.english: This article may be used for reprint as long as authors byline and live link is included.
sentences.chinese: 这篇文章可作再版只要作者函数住在内环线。

sentences.english: The viaduct of the Inner Ring Rd (IRR)abstract: is the core part of Shanghai viaduct network.
sentences.chinese: 内环线高架道路是上海市高架网络的核心部分。

sentences.english: Is this the transfer station for the loop line?
sentences.chinese: 这是去环线地铁的换乘站吗？

definition: encircling the city (of walls, ring road etc)/around the city
along the line (e.g. railway)/the region near the line
abbr. for 立體交叉|立体交叉[li4 ti3 jiao1 cha1] overpass
light rail/transit system (underground, at street level or elevated)/streetcar/metro/abbr. for 輕型軌道交通|轻型轨道交通[qing1 xing2 gui3 dao4 jiao1 tong1]
multiple track (e.g. rail)/multi-lane (e.g. highway)/the complex line (math.)
to open to traffic (e.g. new bridge, rail line etc)/(of a locality) to have a transportation service/(Tw) to commute
to change train (plane, bus etc)/transfer between modes of transport
